alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 6:23AM CDT until May 09 at 9:29AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding spreads across the wide flood plain upstream and downstream. No structures are threatened. Livestock and farm equipment will need to removed from the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 31.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM CDT Monday was 31.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 12.9 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.2 feet on 11/02/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 31.3 Mon 6 am CDT 21.0 14.1 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM CDT.
